Texts.Chs: 你听到电弧冶炼炉里传来一个声音: “哦，闪亮的有机物！轮到我了。来看看吧。得到配方！”
Texts.Eng: You hear a voice from inside the Arc Smelter say 'Ooh, shiny noms! My turn. Come visit. Get recipe!'

Texts.Chs: 你听到电弧冶炼炉里传来一个声音: “哦，闪亮的有机物！轮到我了。这里。拿着配方！”
Texts.Eng: You hear a voice from inside the Arc Smelter say 'Ooh, shiny noms! My turn. Here, have recipe!'
